name: Anidu: Animal Dust Puppet’s Adventure
description:
Rico, a 9-year-old girl who likes dolls, no longer plays with dolls with the advent of a virtual world called "Unreal Planet." Feeling disappointed, the animal dust dolls decide to enter the "Unreal Planet" to talk to Rico. For some reason, the virtual world doesn't welcome anyone other than children... Will the dolls be able to meet Rico?

Solving puzzles using superpowers

The four dolls enter the world of Unreal Planet and gain different superpowers (gravity/time/magnetic/electricity).
Use your dolls' superpowers to solve various puzzles and take on the adventure!

Play with a friend

Both two-player cooperative mode and single play are available.
Two people control one doll each, or one person manipulates two dolls!

Collaborative skills to move together

In the real world, dolls have the concept of dust dolls.
Using this concept, we gave the dolls a common ability to be sticked.
Stick with other players and solve puzzles!

Ride-on adventure

Explore the various attractions of amusement parks in the game Unreal Planet!
Each attraction has a different concept.
I heard there's even a boss stage?!
